name: EGON - Variation 1
description: Click and drag to activate  Created by: John F Simon, Jr.  6/10/21  Code snippet of the first variation of the Egon or hatched line drawing tool.  First coded in 1989,  inspired by Paul Klee and Egon Schiele,  published in a suite of tools by Aldus as part of SuperPaint,  documented in my artist book "Mobility Agents", used in many digital drawings and as a guide for many more drawings by hand
